img: 1964 id_1 The first session  of the UNCTAD I - UN7779095_b98_-min.jpg
text: The first session of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development ([UNCTAD I](https://unctad.org/meeting/first-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-i)) is held from 23 March to 16 June in Geneva, Switzerland.
The Group of 77 ([G77](https://www.g77.org/)) is founded at UNCTAD I.

img: 1964 id_3 UN General Assembly resolution 1995 in dec 1964 UN7516397 -min.jpg
text: UN General Assembly resolution 1995 (XIX) establishes UNCTAD as a permanent intergovernmental body in December.

img: 1964 id_4 Raul Prebisch ( Argentina ) is appointed 1964 UN7654260_87d_-min.jpg
text: [Raúl Prebisch](https://unctad.org/osg/former-secretaries-general-and-officers-charge/raul-prebisch) (Argentina) is appointed the first Secretary-General of UNCTAD.

img: 1967 id_5 The handbook of statistics 1967 UN7456258-min.jpg
text: The [Handbook of Statistics](https://hbs.unctad.org/) report series is launched.

[UNCTAD II](https://unctad.org/meeting/second-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-second-session-unctad-ii) (New Delhi, India) adopts a resolution calling for the establishment of the [Generalized System of Preferences](https://unctad.org/topic/trade-agreements/generalized-system-of-preferences).

img: 1968 id_7 1968 The Review of Maritime Transport- UN7621016 -min.jpg
text: The [Review of Maritime Transport](https://unctad.org/topic/transport-and-trade-logistics/review-of-maritime-transport) report series is launched.
[Manuel Pérez-Guerrero](https://unctad.org/osg/former-secretaries-general-and-officers-charge/manuel-perez-guerrero) (Venezuela) is appointed Secretary-General of UNCTAD.

img: 1971 id_9 The UN recognizes the least 1971 UN7722337-min.jpg
text: The UN recognizes the [least developed countries](https://unctad.org/topic/least-developed-countries) category through the efforts of UNCTAD and the Committee for Development Planning.

img: 1971 id_10 The Group of Twenty-four (G24) UN7420527-min.jpg
text: The Group of Twenty-Four ([G-24](https://www.g24.org/)) is created by developing countries, giving a greater role to UNCTAD in international monetary affairs and development.
[UNCTAD III](https://unctad.org/meeting/third-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-iii) (Santiago, Chile).
[Gamani Corea](https://unctad.org/osg/former-secretaries-general-and-officers-charge/gamani-corea) (Sri Lanka) is appointed Secretary-General of UNCTAD.

img: 1974 id_14 UNCTAD isses a strong call to make 1974 UN7698543-min.jpg
text: UNCTAD issues a strong call to make the global economic system work for developing countries in UN General Assembly resolutions 3201 and 3202(S-VI).

[UNCTAD IV](https://unctad.org/meeting/fourth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-iv) (Nairobi, Kenya) adopts the Integrated Programme for Commodities in response to the challenges faced by developing countries dependent on exports of raw materials.

img: 1979 id_16 The UN General Assembly gives UNCTAD LDC-min.jpg
text: The UN General Assembly designates UNCTAD to lead the preparations for the UN Conference on the Least Developed Countries. It has led the preparations for all five editions of the conference.
[UNCTAD V](https://unctad.org/meeting/fifth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-v) (Manila, Philippines).

img: 1980 id_18 The UN general assembly designates UNCTAD as the system 1980-min.jpg
text: The UN General Assembly designates UNCTAD as the system-wide focal point for competition law and policy.

UNCTAD launches the Automated System for Customs Data ([ASYCUDA](https://unctad.org/topic/transport-and-trade-logistics/customs-automation-ASYCUDA)) programme and the Debt Management and Financial Analysis System ([DMFAS](https://unctad.org/topic/debt-and-finance/dmfas)) programme to support developing countries.

img: 1981 id_20 The trade and development report series 1981  UN7586042-min.jpg
text: The Trade and Development Report series is launched.
[UNCTAD VI](https://unctad.org/meeting/sixth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-vi) (Belgrade, Serbia).

img: 1984 id_23 The least developped countries report series 1984 UN7592300-min.jpg
text: The [Least Developed Countries Report](https://unctad.org/topic/least-developed-countries/least-developed-countries/ldc-report) series is launched.
[Kenneth K.S. Dadzie](https://unctad.org/osg/former-secretaries-general-and-officers-charge/kenneth-ks-dadzie) (Ghana) is appointed Secretary-General of UNCTAD.
[UNCTAD VII](https://unctad.org/meeting/united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-seventh-session-unctad-vii) (Geneva, Switzerland).

img: 1988 id_26 UNCTAD Creates the Empretec 1988 UN7547249-min.jpg
text: UNCTAD creates the [Empretec](https://unctad.org/topic/enterprise-development/Empretec) entrepreneurship capacity-building programme to support entrepreneurs and smaller businesses, particularly in developing countries

img: 1988 id_27 Strong support from UNCTAD leads to the adoption 1988 UN7516397-min.jpg
text: Strong support from UNCTAD leads to the adoption of the [Global System of Trade Preferences among Developing Countries](https://unctad.org/topic/trade-agreements/global-system-of-trade-preferences), which enters into effect in 1989

img: 1991 id_28 The world Investment report series is launched 1991 UN7767726-min.jpg
text: The [World Investment Report](https://unctad.org/publications-search?f%5b0%5d=product%3A397) series is launched.
[UNCTAD VIII](https://unctad.org/meeting/eighth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-viii) (Cartagena, Colombia) adopts a New Partnership for Development.

UNCTAD is appointed Secretariat for the [UN Commission on Science and Technology for Development](https://unctad.org/topic/commission-on-science-and-technology-for-development), which since 2006 has served as the focal point for system wide follow-up of the World Summit on the Information Society outcomes.

img: 1994 id_32 Supported by UNCTAD; Botswana 1994 UN7561920-min.jpg
text: Supported by UNCTAD, Botswana becomes the first nation to graduate from the UN category of [least developed countries](https://unctad.org/topic/least-developed-countries/list).
[Rubens Ricupero](https://unctad.org/osg/former-secretaries-general-and-officers-charge/rubens-ricupero) (Brazil) is appointed Secretary-General of UNCTAD.
[UNCTAD IX](https://unctad.org/meeting/ninth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-ix) (Midrand, South Africa).
The [BioTrade Initiative](https://unctad.org/topic/trade-and-environment/biotrade) is launched to pioneer efforts to conserve biodiversity through sustainable trade
“Positive Agenda” – UNCTAD redoubles efforts to support developing economies to actively participate in global trade negotiations.

img: 2000 id_37 The economic development in Africa report 2000 UN7313071-min.jpg
text: The [Economic Development in Africa Report](https://unctad.org/topic/africa/economic-development-in-africa-report) series is launched.
[UNCTAD X](https://unctad.org/meeting/tenth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-x) (Bangkok, Thailand).

The [E-commerce and Development Report](https://unctad.org/publications-search?f%5b0%5d=product%3A602) series is launched. It becomes the [Information Economy Report](https://unctad.org/publications-search?f%5B0%5D=product%3A391) in 2005 and then the [Digital Economy Report](https://unctad.org/publication/digital-economy-report-2021) in 2019.

[UNCTAD XI](https://unctad.org/meeting/eleventh-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-xi) (São Paulo, Brazil) launches the third round of Global System of Trade Preferences negotiations, which concludes in 2010.
[Supachai Panitchpakdi](https://unctad.org/osg/former-secretaries-general-and-officers-charge/supachai-panitchpakdi) (Thailand) is appointed Secretary-General of UNCTAD.

[UNCTAD XII](https://unctad.org/meeting/twelfth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-xii) (Accra, Ghana) launches the [UN Inter-Agency Cluster on Trade and Productive Capacity](https://unctad.org/projects/UN-Inter-agency-Cluster), comprising 15 UN agencies, including UNCTAD, to boost UN system-wide coherence.

img: 2008 id_44 the World Investment Forum 2008 UN7672777-min.jpg
text: The [World Investment Forum](https://worldinvestmentforum.unctad.org/), a key global event to harness investment for sustainable development, is launched during UNCTAD XII.
UNCTAD organizes the first annual public symposium with civil society to foster dialogue on trade, investment and inclusive, sustainable development.

img: 2010 id_46 The trade, gender and developmebt 2010 UN7398112-min.jpg
text: The Trade, Gender and Development programme is created, fueling UNCTAD’s efforts to make trade policies more gender responsive.

img: 2010 id_47 The technology and innovaztion report series 2010 UN7251905-min.jpg
text: The [Technology and Innovation Report](https://unctad.org/publications-search?f%5b0%5d=product%3A644) series is launched.

img: 2010 id_48 Supported by UNCTAD, the UN Cocoa Ghana-Ivory-coast 2010-min.jpg
text: Supported by UNCTAD, the UN Cocoa Conference concludes negotiations for the 7th International Cocoa Agreement, leading to stronger cooperation between cocoa exporting and importing countries.

img: 2010 id_49 The open source database 2010 UN7280966-min.jpg
text: The free online database [UNCTADstat](https://unctadstat.unctad.org/EN/) is launched on the first-ever World Statistics Day on 20 October.

img: 2012 id_50 The Commodities and Development Report series 2012 UN7360959-min.jpg
text: The [Commodities and Development Report](https://unctad.org/publications-search?f%5b0%5d=product%3A588) series is launched.
[UNCTAD XIII](https://unctad.org/meeting/thirteenth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-xiii) (Doha, Qatar) features gender equality prominently in the trade agenda.
[Mukhisa Kituyi](https://unctad.org/about/office-of-the-secretary-general/mukhisa-kituyi) (Kenya) is appointed Secretary-General of UNCTAD.
2014-present

UNCTAD opens a [Regional Office for Africa](https://unctad.org/about/regional-office-africa) in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, to directly provide high-level technical expertise and advisory services to African countries and regional organizations.

The General Assembly adopts the revised [UN Guidelines for Consumer Protection](https://unctad.org/topic/competition-and-consumer-protection/un-guidelines-for-consumer-protection) in 2015. UNCTAD serves as the focal point on consumer protection issues within the UN system.
[UNCTAD 14](https://unctad.org/meeting/fourteenth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-14) (Nairobi, Kenya).

img: 2019 id_57 UNCTAD launches the annual public 2009 UN7251910-min.jpg
text: The [Statistics Quality Assurance Framework](https://unctad.org/publication/statistics-quality-assurance-framework) is launched to ensure quality statistics for development.

img: 2019 id_58 UNCTAD is a founiding partner of World Cotton Day 2019 UN7824008-min.jpg
text: UNCTAD is a founding partner of [World Cotton Day](https://unctad.org/es/isar/news/fibre-fabric-celebrating-value-cotton), celebrated on 7 October.

img: 2021 id_59 Teh Pdorductive Capacities Index 2021 UN7911716-min.jpg
text: The [Productive Capacities Index](https://unctad.org/publication/digital-economy-report-2021) is launched to help developing countries better assess and improve their economic performance.
[Rebeca Grynspan](https://unctad.org/about/office-of-the-secretary-general) (Costa Rica) makes history as the first woman appointed Secretary-General of UNCTAD.
[UNCTAD 15](https://unctad.org/meeting/fifteenth-session-united-nations-conference-trade-and-development-unctad-15) (Bridgetown, Barbados).

img: 2022 id_62 UNCTAD plays a key role in the UN Global Crisis Reponse Group 2022 UN7946166-min.jpg
text: UNCTAD plays a key role in the [UN Global Crisis Response Group on Food, Energy and Finance](https://news.un.org/pages/global-crisis-response-group/) launched by UN Secretary-General António Guterres to support developing countries facing unprecedented geopolitical, health and climate shocks to their economies.

At COP28, UNCTAD and partners contribute to the first-ever [Trade Day](https://unctad.org/news/cop28-first-ever-trade-day-puts-focus-trade-climate-action) and host the [Trade House Pavilion](https://unctad.org/news/cop28-unctad-and-partners-show-how-trade-can-advance-pro-development-climate-goals), bringing trade and climate policymakers and experts together for the first time in a UN climate conference.

img: 2024 id_64 Rebranding to 'UN Trade and Development' 2024-min.jpg
text: UNCTAD rebrands to [UN Trade and Development(UNCTAD)](https://unctad.org/news/unctad-rebrands-un-trade-and-development) to improve the understanding and impact of its mission, ensuring that the perspectives of developing countries are heard in all global economic, trade and development processes.
UN Trade and Development (UNCTAD) marks its [60th anniversary](https://unctad.org/meeting/unctads-60th-anniversary).
